Articles.Content:
Many times I launch a ship and after a while, I see that I have forget something (solar panels, docking ports, parachutes, ...), then I must revert mission or land back to Kerbin.

It could be fun, to send a rescue mission with the missing parts and add it with EVA.

A simple GUI system could be to add a blueprint on the targeted ship (just like in SPH), then right clic with EVA to take the new part, and right clic on the blue print to put it.

This could be use for repairing deficients parts.

For minor issues you just need to EVA, for critical ones you need to send a new part and fix it.

This way, you could recover parts after a bad landing on Mun, almost repair it and come back.

Yep. While I'd also like this as stock, KAS has whatever you need.

Which is utter bunk for me, as I don't play modded anymore (maybe just two ).
